Name: Black Knight Sword

Name: Claymore

Special Note: One handed and two handed strong attack is changed to a powerful downward slash.

Name: Greatsword of Artorias
Availability: Ascension only. Upgrade +10 Broken Sword with Soul of Sif
Special Note: One handed strong attack is replaced with a charged dashing thrust. Two handed strong attack is replaced with a charged wide horizontal slash.

Name: Greatsword of Artorias
Availability: Ascension only. Upgrade +10 straight sword with Soul of Sif

Name: Obsidian Greatsword
Availability: Black Dragon Kalameet drop (if tail is severed)
